ygData.subject: RE: Play the damn mana song (was: RE: [eqbards] Proposal to chang e how ...)
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of an all or nothing group i had the best fun in ages yesterday in dreadlands. The Group... 2 lizard monks, 1 warrior, 1 lizzie sk and a ranger and me
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of an all or nothing group i had the best fun in ages yesterday in
dreadlands.

The Group...
2 lizard monks, 1 warrior, 1 lizzie sk and a ranger and me pulling.

No downtime, ranger would snare incoming mob and then we'd fear kite,
nothing lasted more then 5 seconds. I'd take off to pull another when it was
1/4 health. I'm definetly going to try to do that group again in dreadlands
again soon, it was very very nice xp 8)

And there was much rejoicing as our bardic adventurer had for once no need
to "play mana song"

Minkin


-----Original Message-----
From: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
Sent: January 12, 2001 6:20 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com; eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: Play the damn mana song (was: RE: [eqbards] Proposal to
change how ...)


At 09:12 AM 1/12/01 -0500, Stephen E. McCloskey wrote:
>Ugggg. Last night was the first time someone actually said to me, "just
>play mana song". I always thought I wouldn't get insulted but I did. I
>told him that he had to be kidding, it's going to take longer to kill the
>mobs and you will be healing more. He was the only caster in the group, so
>I choose to buff the melee people. After a couple minutes of arguing about
>it (he found out I was right) he said, "got to log, bye".
>
>The mana song is a blessing and a curse. Get a friggin' enchanter if you
>want constant mana regen.
>
>-Steve
>38 bard
>
> >Fortunately most groups don't actually
> >threaten to kick me out when I refuse to just play manasong in actual
> >combat.
> >
> > Kit

The only time I played only Clarity all through combat was with a group of
5 casters in The Overthere. I've never done it since as that was one of the
most boring things I've ever done.

I always love being in a group that has a couple of tanks as I can combat
buff them very nicely then hymn/clarity/cantana during downtime for the
casters. Definitely ideal.

---Windleaf

with the subject submissions.
